Attached please find our Product Advisory for the recent changes to TIBRS reporting. If there are any questions please do not hesitate to contact us at 1-800-756-8324
Sincerely,
Janice C. Kivett Manager Customer Service TriTech Software Systems | www.tritech.com Direct: (910) 602-7363 | Mobile: (910) 352-5990 Support: (800) 756-8324
